songs.title: Despacito
songs.lyrics:
Sí, sabes que ya llevo un rato mirándote
Tengo que bailar contigo hoy

songs.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
songs.lyrics: Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?

songs.title: Blinding Lights
songs.lyrics:
I said, ooh, I'm blinded by the lights
No, I can't sleep until I feel your touch

songs.title: Essence
songs.lyrics: You don't need no other body Only you fi hold my body

songs.title: Love Nwantiti
songs.lyrics: Ahh ahh ahh ahh ahhh My baby, my valentine

songs.lyrics: These streets ain't safe But I stay dangerous

songs.title: Life Goes On
songs.lyrics: Like an echo in the forest The day will come back around

songs.title: The Box
songs.lyrics: Pullin' out the coupe at the lot Told 'em, 'f**k 12, f**k SWAT'

songs.lyrics:
She's in love with who I am
Back in high school, I used to bus it to the dance

songs.title: Way 2 Sexy
songs.lyrics: I'm too sexy for this syrup Too sexy for your girl

songs.title: Mood
songs.lyrics: Why you always in a mood? Messin' 'round, actin' brand new

songs.title: Finesse
songs.lyrics: Folake for the night, o Shey you dey for me?

songs.title: Montero (Call Me By Your Name)
songs.lyrics:

Call me in the morning, I'll be on the way

songs.title: Jerusalema
songs.lyrics: Jerusalema ikhaya lami Ngilondoloze, uhambe nami
